findings.title: INSUFFICIENT_BURNED
findings.description: The require statement checks if stockAmount and moneyAmount are greater than 0, otherwise it reverts with the error 'OneSwap: INSUFFICIENT_BURNED'. This suggests that there might be a scenario where the burn function is not called or the amounts are not properly updated.

findings.title: INVALID_BALANCE
findings.description: The require statement checks if stockBalance and moneyBalance are greater than or equal to reserveStock and reserveMoney respectively. If this condition is not met, it reverts with an 'INVALID_BALANCE' error.

findings.title: Potential gastoken attacks
findings.description: The _safeTransfer function limits gas to 9000 to prevent gastoken attacks.
findings.function: _safeTransfer(address token, address to, uint value, address ones)

findings.title: Issue with stock contact or money contact
findings.description: If there's an issue with the stock contact or money contact, it can lead to a contract being unable to call normally and tokens of another contract being locked forever.
